name: Mansion of Puzzles - Escape
description:
You, as a detective with a secret mission to go on a cryptic mansion, where you will discover all its secrets and mysteries! Use your ingenuity to the full!

Open the locks, solve challenging puzzles and riddles, collect cards and examine the details, even let's shoot a shotgun! Everything is useful in order to open 100 Doors!

Here is a new game from the developers of a series of puzzles: 100 Doors - Seasons!

For a long time, we will not describe, And now let us focus on creating new puzzles! And you do not come here to reading!
We look forward to your feedback!

Unravel all the mysteries of the cryptic house!

FEATURES:
• Mini puzzles
• Find the Hidden Objects
• Tips for beginners
• Skip difficult levels.
• The soothing sounds and beautiful visual effects
• Each new level has an original and beautiful graphics.
• Regular updates, with new puzzles
• Free puzzles - logic games!
• Do not worry - is addictive and very interesting game!

Bonbeart - interesting games for a good mood!

STUCK? - GET HELP:

Feel yourself in the role of Sherlock Holmes!
